_doc: Monster spell assignments - patched into SLES_008.45 inside the game BIN
_doc2: Set enabled=true to apply the patch. Set spell_index to the desired entry (0-15).
_doc3: Odd entries (1,3,5,7) are reversed versions of even entries (0,2,4,6).
_doc4: Structure: bytes[2-9]=offensive (direct spell IDs), bytes[0-1,10-15]=support (unknown encoding).
_doc5: Support encoding: 0xA0=Sleep(confirmed), 0x1F=Healing(likely). Not standard spell IDs.

_options.0: ATK: Fire Bullet, Spark Bullet, Water Bullet, Stone Bullet | SUP: 0xA0=Sleep?, 0x1F=Heal? (Low)
_options.2: ATK: Striking, Lightbolt, Stone Bullet, Water Bullet | SUP: 0xBF, 0x1F, 0xB0 (Low)
_options.4: ATK: Dark Wave, Smash, Stone Bullet, Spark Bullet | SUP: 0xBF, 0x1F, 0xAF, 0xB0 (Low)
_options.6: ATK: Magic Missile, Enchant Weapon, Stone Bullet | SUP: 0xA0=Sleep, 0x1F=Heal, 0xAF, 0xB0 (Low) (ORIGINAL)
_options.8: ATK: Blaze, Lightningbolt, Blizzard, Poison Cloud | SUP: 0xDF, 0x20, 0xC0, 0x2F, 0xB0 (Mid)
_options.9: ATK: Blizzard, Extend Spell, Magic Ray, Poison Cloud | SUP: 0xDF, 0x2F, 0xC0, 0x20 (Mid)
_options.10: ATK: Poison Cloud, Magic Ray, Shining, Dark Breath | SUP: 0xC0, 0x3F, 0xDF, 0x30, 0x20 (High)
_options.11: ATK: Extend Spell, Magic Ray, Shining, Dispell Magic | SUP: 0xC0, 0x3F, 0xDF, 0x30 (High)
_options.12: ATK: Blizzard, Extend Spell, Petrifaction, Dispell Magic | SUP: 0xC0, 0x3F, 0xDF, 0x30 (High)
_options.13: ATK: Lightningbolt, Blizzard, Explosion, Petrifaction | SUP: 0xC0, 0x3F, 0xDF, 0x30 (High)
_options.14: ATK: Blaze, Lightningbolt, Thunderbolt, Explosion | SUP: 0xC0, 0x3F, 0xDF, 0x30 (High)
_options.15: ATK: Blaze, Poison Cloud, Dark Breath, Thunderbolt | SUP: 0xC0, 0x3F, 0xDF, 0x30 (High)

type_0x12_caster._comment: Second spell-caster opcode (unknown monster). Default index=4.

_spell_table_doc: Overrides spell table entries directly in BLAZE.ALL at 0x9E8D8E (16 entries x 16 bytes). Use copy_from to clone another entry, or bytes for custom hex. This works independently of the EXE spell_index patch above.

6._comment: Replace default Shaman entry #6 (Magic Missile, Enchant Weapon, Stone Bullet) with entry #8 (Blaze, Lightningbolt, Blizzard, Poison Cloud). Tests if spell table content matters when L=NULL.
